ChangeRequestRelatedItem.name: ChangeRequestRelatedItem
ChangeRequestRelatedItem.description: Represents a junction object that relates a ChangeRequest to an Asset.

AssetId.description: The Asset ID that’s linked to the ChangeRequest.

ChangeRequestId.description: The ChangeRequest ID that’s linked to the Asset.

Comment.description: A description of the change request as it relates to the item.

ImpactLevel.description: The related item's impact on the change request.

Name.description: The auto-generated ID of the item that's related to the change request.

RelationshipType.description: Shows how the ChangeRequest and Asset records relate to each other.
